action_plan: New tech incorporation often needs immediate cloud setup and cybersecurity compliance. Pitch the 'Startup Launchpad' package.
High-value office fit-out detected. Pitch premium office furniture and smart meeting room solutions immediately.
New Sales VP means new budget for lead gen tools. Pitch your agency as an extension of their new sales team.
New retail location requires POS systems and local SEO visibility. Offer a 'Grand Opening' digital package.
Significant capital injection suggests readiness for enterprise-grade security auditing.
